name: Demand Forecasting - Data Scientist App
description: Detecting time series patterns and forecasting using Prophet and SARIMAX models

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Demand Forecasting Model Building App

Overview

This app enables business users to forecast future product demand across different stores using advanced time-series models. By analyzing past sales data and identifying patterns like seasonality and trends, it supports more accurate inventory planning, pricing strategy, and promotional decision-making.

Input

  • + stores and product SKUs
  • + Model

Output

  • + Sales Forecasts: Predicted monthly average sales for each product
  • + Actual vs Forecast Charts: Visual comparison of forecasted vs actual sales
  • + Trend and Seasonality Insights: Graphs that break down long-term trends and recurring seasonal patterns
  • + Model Performance Metrics: Evaluation metrics like MAPE and RMSE for accuracy assessment
  • + Gen AI Report: A 12-month forward-looking report for all items

Benefits

  • + Inventory Optimization: Helps balance stock levels to reduce overstocking and stockouts
  • + Strategic Planning: Supports annual and quarterly sales projections using trend and pattern discovery
  • + Sales Insights: Identifies top-selling SKUs and their seasonal behaviors
  • + Agile Forecasting: Easily test and switch between different forecasting models based on business needs
  • + Scalability: Supports expansion across multiple stores, product categories, and SKUs
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html2", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Data Description

Field Name Description
Product Category The identifier or name of the Product Category where the item was sold.
Product Name The identifier or name of the item sold.
Total_Quantity_Sold The total quantity of the item sold in the sales transaction.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html1", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "Next", "action": "event", "showValidations": false, "theme": "info", "customClass": "btn- mt-0 float-right", "tableView": false, "key": "getStarted", "type": "button", "event": "next", "input": true } ] }
